title: MultiModal RAG with watsonx LLaVA-Next
author: Gautam Chutani, Shilpi Varshney
description:
This repository contains how to setup basic MultiModal RAG and other use-cases with LLaVa via vLLM on CPU and LLaVa-Next Model available on watsonx.ai.
It also contains useful functions for image base64 format conversion.
